expressions.name: exp_1
expressions.llm_description: 10-period rolling mean of 20-period EMA of absolute value of lagged 96-period return skewness
expressions.llm_reason: Combines long-term skewness information with short-term EMA trend to capture potential reversal signals.

expressions.name: exp_2
expressions.llm_description: 5-period percentage change of 10-period rolling standard deviation of 24-period realized volatility
expressions.llm_reason: Utilizes volatility changes to identify potential momentum shifts in the short term.

expressions.name: exp_3
expressions.llm_description: 20-period rolling mean of 9-period Money Flow Index minus 20-period rolling mean of 14-period Money Flow Index, clipped between -0.5 and 0.5
expressions.llm_reason: Measures the difference in short-term and medium-term money flow trends while limiting extreme values.
